description: AMENDMENTS TO PLANNING APPLICATION 24/P3263 TO INCLUDE A REDUCTION IN WALL HEIGHT ON THE BOUNDARY WITH NO.67 KINGSWOOD ROAD TO 2.7M HIGH, INSTALLATION OF ROOF LANTERN IN REAR GROUND FLOOR EXTENSION, ENLARGEMENT OF GROUND FLOOR SIDE WINDOW AND DEMOLITION OF EXISTING GARDEN SHED AND ERECTION OF OUTBUILDING IN REAR GARDEN.
decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - Commencement of development (Full Permission) - The development to which this permission relates shall be commenced not later than the expiration of 3 years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - Approved Plans - The development hereby permitted shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans:Drawing no: 01/Rev 01 - WIP (Existing Site Location Plan and Proposed Site Plan) Dated 26 02 2025 
Drawing no: 023 / PL01/Rev - (Location Plan and Block Plan) Dated10.10.2024 
Drawing no: 023 / PL06/Rev A (Proposed Ground Floor Plan, Proposed First Floor Plan, Proposed Loft Plan and Proposed Roof Plan) Dated 04 02 2025
Drawing no.023 / PL07/Rev E (Proposed Front Elevation Plan (Southwest), Proposed Side Elevation Plan (Northwest), Proposed Side Elevation Plan (Southeast) And Proposed Rear Elevation Plan (Northeast)) Dated 04 02 2025 
Drawing no: 02 (Proposed Outbuilding Front Elevation Plan, Proposed East Elevation Plan, Proposed Left Elevation Plan, Proposed Rear Elevation Plan and Proposed Roof Plan) Dated 26 02 2025 
Planning, Design and Access Statement 
Site Photographs in the Existing Site  Location Plan Received on 27/02/2025 .

Condition : 3 - Materials as Specified - The facing materials to be used for the development hereby permitted shall be those specified in the application form unless otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority.

Condition : 4 - The development hereby permitted shall not be rented, sold independently or occupied at any time other than for purposes as garden room ancillary to the main enjoyment of the  residential use of the  residents in the dwelling known as  No:65 Kingswood Road, Wimbledon, SW19 3ND.

Condition : 5 - Removal of PD (Windows/Doors) - Notwithstanding the provisions of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development)(England) Order 2015 (or any order revoking and re-enacting that Order with or without modification), no window, door or other opening other than those expressly authorised by this permission shall be constructed in the side elevations without planning permission first being obtained from the Local Planning Authority.

Condition : 6 - No Use of Flat Roof  - Access to the flat roof of the development hereby permitted shall be for maintenance or emergency purposes only, and the flat roof shall not be used as a roof garden, terrace, patio or similar amenity area.

Condition : 7 - INFORMATIVE (Party Wall Act) - The applicant is advised to check the requirements of the Party Wall Act 1996 relating to work on an existing wall shared with another property, building on the boundary with a neighbouring property, or excavating near a neighbouring building. Further information is available at the following link: 
https://www.gov.uk/party-walls-building-works

Condition : 8 - INFORMATIVE
Note to Applicant -Approved Schemes
In accordance with paragraph 38 of the National Planning Policy Framework, London Borough of Merton (LBM) takes a positive and proactive approach to the delivery of sustainable development, by:
1. Providing a formal pre-application advice service, details to be found on Planning pre-application advice service on LBM's website
2. Providing written policies and guidance, which is available to view on LBM's website.
3. Where appropriate, negotiating amendments to secure a positive decision.
4. Determining applications in a timely manner including providing a fast track service, details to be found on Get a quicker planning decision on LBM's website.

In this instance:
i) The application was acceptable as submitted, and approved without delay
